title: Reverse Conjurer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Conjure a meteor to attack someone during the night. Immediately (aka as soon as host sees the message) the target will be hit with an Astral Powerful Attack, announcing their death as well. (1 use)
- With Necronomicon, you may choose a player to attack during the day, attacking them as soon as the day ends. If the target had defense the night before, your attack will process like they had said defense and your target is informed they were attacked when night begins.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Cannot conjure Night 1.
- Cannot attack Day 1.
- Players that were originally going to visit a player targeted by a meteor will simply not visit if they do not choose a new target.
- Will not spawn if Conjurer (3858) spawns.

desc:
Post 5450
*"If Jailor can kidnap people at dawn, what's stopping me from killing before dawn?"*
